[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esengine/ecs-framework-monorepo](./ecs-framework-monorepo.md) &gt; [Matrix3](./ecs-framework-monorepo.matrix3.md)

## Matrix3 class

3x3变换矩阵类

用于2D变换（平移、旋转、缩放）的3x3矩阵 矩阵布局： \[m00, m01, m02\] \[scaleX \* cos, -scaleY \* sin, translateX\] \[m10, m11, m12\] = \[scaleX \* sin, scaleY \* cos, translateY\] \[m20, m21, m22\] \[0, 0, 1\]

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Matrix3 
```
